con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="TESTMappingDatatypesINFMAPWSEXP_TESTMappingDatatypesHttp_Service" targetNamespace="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/inf/TESTMappingDatatypes/Binding" xmlns:Port_0="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/inf/TESTMappingDatatypes" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:this="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/inf/TESTMappingDatatypes/Binding" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsdl:import location="TESTMappingDatatypes.wsdl" namespace="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/inf/TESTMappingDatatypes"/> <wsdl:binding name="TESTMappingDatatypesINFMAPWSEXP_TESTMappingDatatypesHttpBinding" type="Port_0:TESTMappingDatatypes"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="testMapping"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="testMappingRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="testMappingResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="TESTMappingDatatypesINFMAPWSEXP_TESTMappingDatatypesHttpService"> <wsdl:port binding="this:TESTMappingDatatypesINFMAPWSEXP_TESTMappingDatatypesHttpBinding" name="TESTMappingDatatypesINFMAPWSEXP_TESTMappingDatatypesHttpPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:9080/stelvio-test-mappingdatatypesWeb/sca/TESTMappingDatatypesINFMAPWSEXP"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions name="TESTMappingDatatypes" targetNamespace="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/inf/TESTMappingDatatypes" xmlns:bons1="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/bo" xmlns:tns="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/inf/TESTMappingDatatypes" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/inf/TESTMappingDatatypes"> <xsd:import namespace="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/bo" schemaLocation="../bo/TestMappingBO.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="testMapping"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="testMappingRequest" nillable="true" type="bons1:TestMappingBO"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="testMappingResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="testMappingResponse" nillable="true" type="bons1:TestMappingBO"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="testMappingRequestMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:testMapping" name="testMappingParameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="testMappingResponseMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:testMappingResponse" name="testMappingResult"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="TESTMappingDatatypes"> <wsdl:operation name="testMapping"> <wsdl:input message="tns:testMappingRequestMsg" name="testMappingRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:testMappingResponseMsg" name="testMappingResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/bo" xmlns:bons0="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/bo" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="complexTypeBO.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="TestMappingBO"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="boolean" type="xsd:boolean"></xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="date" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="int" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="double" type="xsd:double"></xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="complexType" type="bons0:complexTypeBO"></xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="complexType2" type="bons0:complexTypeBO"></xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="string2" type="xsd:string"></xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="byte" type="xsd:byte"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="float" type="xsd:float"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="long" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="short" type="xsd:short"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="booleanNillable" nillable="true" type="xsd:boolean"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

con:testStep.name: mapping from null string into complex type

con:request.name: mapping from null string into complex type
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tes="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/inf/TESTMappingDatatypes"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tes:testMapping> <testMappingRequest> <text>test</text> <!-- the element string2 is mapped into complexType2 in the mapping rule on ESB --> <!-- this test ensures that the ESB does not instanciate the complexType2 object --> <!-- as long as the string2 element is null --> </testMappingRequest> </tes:testMapping> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: verifikasjon av nillable
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tes="http://stelvio-test-mappingdatatypes/no/nav/inf/TESTMappingDatatypes"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tes:testMapping> <testMappingRequest> <!-- this test verifies that booleanNillable is not set to false when it is not set in input --> </testMappingRequest> </tes:testMapping> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
